title: Bond Cleaning Checklist – Ipswich Region
description: Step-by-step checklist that Ipswich tenants use to guarantee their bond back.

faq.question: What is included?
faq.answer: Kitchen (incl. oven/rangehood), bathrooms, bedrooms/living (walls, fans, windows/tracks), laundry, outdoors, and a final detail pass.

faq.question: How long does it take?
faq.answer: 3–6 hours for a unit/small house; larger or heavily lived‑in homes take longer.

faq.question: Do you guarantee bond return?
faq.answer: Yes—our bond‑back service includes re‑clean support aligned to agent feedback.

title: What Real Estate Agents Want
description: Learn what local agents expect for a successful bond clean.

faq.question: What do agents look for?
faq.answer: Oven interiors, bathrooms/grout, glass and window tracks, walls/spot marks, fans, and floors/carpets.

faq.question: How do I pass first time?
faq.answer: Work top‑to‑bottom with a final daylight detail check and keep receipts/photos for proof.

title: Eco-Friendly Bond Cleaning
description: How to get your bond back using eco-friendly cleaning methods.

faq.question: Are eco products effective?
faq.answer: Yes—citrus‑based degreasers and hydrogen peroxide‑based bathroom cleaners meet standards when used correctly.

faq.question: Where can I use them?
faq.answer: Use low‑pH cleaners on glass and high‑pH degreasers on ovens and rangehoods; always spot test.

title: Client Stories
description: Real stories from Ipswich tenants who got their bond back.

faq.question: Can I see testimonials?
faq.answer: Yes—our case studies show before/after results and agent feedback.
